name: Performapal Odd-Eyes Metal Claw
desc:
1 "Odd-Eyes" monster + 1 "Performapal" monster
Cannot be used as Fusion Material. If this card is Fusion Summoned using "Polymerization", it is unaffected by other cards' effects. If this card declares an attack: All monsters you currently control gain 300 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase.

ocg.pack: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V The Strongest Duelist Yuya!! Volume 1
